comments.projectName: The name of your project - used for folder structure validation and reporting
comments.menuPath: Unity Editor menu path for Story Test tools. Must end with '/'
comments.assemblyFilters: Array of assembly name patterns to validate. Empty array = validate all project assemblies
comments.includeUnityAssemblies: Set to true to validate Unity engine assemblies (not recommended)
comments.validateOnStart: Automatically run validation when ProductionExcellenceStoryTest MonoBehaviour starts
comments.strictMode: Enable strict validation mode with stricter rules
comments.exportPath: Path where validation reports are exported (relative to project root)
